item.title: MYCURE - Easy, Secure, Medical Records and Clinic Management System
item.description: MYCURE is your most complete clinic management system that securely integrates patient records together from registration to billing using its patient-focused, business-friendly, and flexible technology. MYCURE is one of the top medical apps and best DPA-compliant EMR practice management software in the Philippines.

item.title: MYCURE - Hospital Information System
item.description: MYCURE is your most complete secure, online medical software for doctors and clinics that is easy to customize. It has EMR, Laboratory (LIS), Imaging (RIS), Inventory, Point-of-Sales (POS) and Billing Modules designed to securely process digital medical records. Get the perfect blend for your clinic.

item.title: MYCURE - Most Complete Dental Clinic System
item.description: Your most complete dental clinic management solution is here! MYCURE's latest upgrade for Dentists can do charts online and offline and more — most efficiently.

item.title: MYCURE Our Story - Caring the Extra Mile
item.description: Caring the extra mile is our profession, it’s our way of life. MYCURE is committed to saving lives by building well-equipped and well-designed apps so healthcare practitioners are in the most ideal work environment to fulfill their purpose.
